wikipedia_page.main: Darren Allinson (born 13 November 1987), a Welsh professional rugby union player. Allinson currently plays for Bath Rugby in the Aviva Premiership and plays at scrum half. He attended Ysgol Y Gwendraeth.

response: *Nic Cudd, Hugh Gustafson and Darren Allinson - Professional rugby union players.
